description: This course emphasizes critical thinking, conversation, collaboration, and academic habits for the liberal arts. Students learn key skills like locating and evaluating academic sources, as well as reading, reflecting, and responding to texts. Students cultivate their own curiosity while also learning how to engage in community, better understanding their responsibilities to each other. This course is open to first-year students and a limited number of sophomores. Prerequisite: first-year student status.
name: Top: Race in 20th Century Music

notes: Section topic: Race in 20th Century Music

title: First-Year Seminar
